keywords: ['guitar instruction', 'acoustic guitar', 'male voice', 'single strum', '7th chord', 'no other instruments', 'no vocal melody']
caption: This guitar instruction audio features an acoustic guitar. This starts off with a male voice giving instructions on how to play the guitar. The bass note is played on the open string and the chord is strummed once. This is the Hendrix chord being played on the acoustic guitar. There are no other instruments in this song. There is no vocal melody in this song. This audio can be used in a guitar instruction video.
